about_the_game:
Discover a Unique and Accessible Shoot 'Em Up by GLHF Studio

Created by a solo developer under the banner of GLHF Studio, with stunning illustrations crafted by Aud.Idea, this arcade shmup offers a truly unique visual and gameplay experience. Dive into the thrilling adventure of daring pilots rebels with a cause, who use their flying skills and ships to bring peace… for a price. Soaring across the skies, they rescue the oppressed from the clutches of evil, restoring harmony while obliterating fleets of determined enemies along the way.

A Shmup for Everyone

Designed to be a fun, accessible, and cozy experience, this vertical shooter invites the whole family to enjoy a world where frenetic action meets relaxation. Perfect for introducing players to the bullet hell genre, the game combines simple mechanics with progressively challenging gameplay, making it an ideal entry point for newcomers while staying engaging for seasoned fans.

Explore, Destroy, and Upgrade

Travel through diverse landscapes and enchanting backdrops, face enemies with unique designs, and progress across the map while collecting precious resources. These resources allow you to upgrade your ship’s stats, boosting its power to tackle increasingly difficult challenges.

Multiplayer on the Horizon

A multiplayer mode is planned for the future, enabling you to play with friends via Steam Remote Play. This separate mode will allow players to team up to collect even more resources, then use their upgraded ships to face new threats together.

GLHF Studio delivers a short yet delightfully fun production, blending nostalgia and modernity to create a memorable and accessible shmup experience. Whether you're here to blow off steam or to explore the joys of shoot 'em ups, this game promises to transport you to a world of action, peace… and rebellion.

name: AERA Flying Heroes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or equivalent AMD processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10, 11, or 12 compatible GPU with at least 512 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Steam connection required to launch the game
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1660 or AMD Radeon RX 590 with 6 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Steam connection required to launch the game

short_description: Dive into a vertical shoot 'em up blending action with a fantasy-aviator universe. Face waves of enemies, upgrade your ship, and take on epic challenges against formidable bosses. Accessible, captivating, and designed for enthusiasts, this game promises an intense and unforgettable experience.
